code: import{useEffect}from"react";const CheckAnswer=_ref=>{let{clickData,characterItem,setIsCorrect,showPopup,setShowPopup,isCorrect}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{if(clickData&&!showPopup){if(characterItem&&clickData===characterItem.gender){console.log('正解！');setShowPopup(true);setIsCorrect(true);}else{console.log('残念！');setShowPopup(true);setIsCorrect(false);};}},[clickData]);return null;};export default CheckAnswer;
